item.title: \eAn Overview of Diffusion Models\e\c扩散模型概述\c
item.description:
## 生成式模型
> [!NOTE] > This article currently only supports Chinese.
[DDPM](https://arxiv.org/abs/2006.11239)
$$ x_t = \sqrt{\alpha_t}x_{t-1} + \sqrt{1 - \alpha_t}\epsilon $$
